alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:01PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Graham and central Greenlee Counties through 445 PM MST... At 401 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Clifton, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Safford, Clifton, Solomon, Morenci, Safford Regional Airport, York, Three Way, Guthrie and Swift Trail Junction. This includes the following highways... Route 70 between mile markers 341 and 361, and between mile markers 363 and 368. Route 75 between mile markers 385 and 398. Route 78 between mile markers 155 and 174. Route 191 between mile markers 131 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
